pkgfinal

Class Recipe

  • java.lang.Object
    • pkgfinal.Recipe
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RecipeBox

    public class Recipe
extends java.lang.Object
    The Recipe class is used to create recipes to be stored in the recipe collection.
